author: Het Laatste Nieuws
title: Ground News - Viral photo, even more powerful story: how 90-year-old grandma was spared by Hamas terrorists thanks to Lionel Messi
text: At the World Cup in Qatar, he was Argentina's savior several times, but Summary by Het Laatste Nieuws Lionel Messi can also be of great value off the football field. This shows a tragic story of a 90-year-old woman who, thanks to the Argentine star, was spared by the Hamas terrorists. 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right [] Het Laatste Nieuws At the World Cup in Qatar, he was Argentina's savior several times, but Lionel Messi can also be of great value off the football field.
